info.title: Birdie - OpenAPI 3.0.0
info.description:
This is the BIRDIE OpenAPI based on the OpenAPI 3.0 specification.
This OpenAPI Specification is used by both the BIRDIE website for reporting and map viewer for visualization purposes.
You can find out more about Swagger at [https://swagger.io](https://swagger.io). Some useful links: - [The Birdie Website](https://birdie.sanbi.org.za/) - [The Birdie Map Viewer](https://birdieapp.sanbi.org.za/birdie/mviewer)

contact.name: Institute of Natural Sciences - Biodiversity & Ecosystems Data & Information centre

tags.name: Variables
tags.description: Access ancillary data and additional variables

get.summary: Get data for ancillary variables

parameters.name: parameter
parameters.description: The parameter for which to retrieve data. Valid values are prcp (precipitation), tmmn (average minimum temperature), tmmx (average maximum temperature), elev (elevation), ndvi (normalized difference vegetation index), watext (water extent), watrec (water recurrence), elev (elevation), dist-coast (distance to coast)

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for which to retrieve data. Valid values are between the range 2008 - 2023 (for elevation & dist-coast, year = 2023)

200.description: The geojson data for the specified year and parameter.

get.summary: Get CWAC sites info on species (numbers, redlisting status...)

parameters.name: sites
parameters.description: The site location (loc_code) code for which to retrieve data (eg. 26352535 (Barberspan), 33592239 (Eilandvlei), 34052454 (Seekoei River Estuary)).

get.summary: Get  Waterbird Conservation Value (WCV) info on species at a site

parameters.name: sites
parameters.description: The site location (loc_code) code for which to retrieve data (eg. 26352535 (Barberspan), 33592239 (Eilandvlei), 34052454 (Seekoei River Estuary)).

get.summary: Get the RAMSAR sites info
Get the waterbirds 1 percents levels info
Get AOO info of species

parameters.name: species
parameters.description: The species code (key_value) for which to retrieve data (eg. 212 (Coot, Red-knobbed), 149 (Eagle, African Fish)). You can put multiple codes, separated by a comma (eg. 269,212,149).

get.summary: Get the list of sites filtered by convention (AEWA...), type (wetland, dam...) and province

parameters.name: site_convention
parameters.description: convention ID (AEWA, all)

parameters.name: site_group
parameters.description: Provinces (ALL, Eastern Cape, Free State, Gauteng, KwaZulu-Natal, Limpopo, Mpumalanga, North West, Northern Cape, Western Cape)

parameters.name: site_type
parameters.description: site type ID (wetland = 9, dam = 10, estuary = 7, marine-coast-island = 11, river = 8)

get.summary: Get the proportion or slope modeled information on species at a site, over a range of years
get.description: See also v1/list_species for all species codes

parameters.name: sites
parameters.description: The site location (loc_code) code for which to retrieve data (eg. 26352535 (Barberspan), 33592239	(Eilandvlei), 34052454 (Seekoei River Estuary)).

parameters.name: species
parameters.description: The species code (key_value) for which to retrieve data (eg. 269 (Avocet, Pied), 212 (Coot, Red-knobbed), 149 (Eagle, African Fish)). You can put multiple codes, separated by a comma (eg. 269,212,149).

parameters.name: ratio
parameters.description: Winter/Summer ratio (PROP) or rate of change (SLOPE)

parameters.name: start_year
parameters.description: The start year of the interval for which to retrieve data. Valid values are between the range 2008 - 2023.

parameters.name: end_year
parameters.description: The end year of the interval for which to retrieve data. Valid values are between the range 2008 - 2023.

get.summary: Get the guilds and species under that guild
Get the list of species used
get.description: See the species code (key_value), common name and scientific name

200.description: A List of Species for BIRDIE

get.summary: Get the predicted occurrence of a species in a pentad (estimate 'est', median 'med', upper bound 'up', lower bound 'lb')
get.description: See also v1/list_species for all species codes, and the map viewer for a pentad code

parameters.name: pentad
parameters.description: The pentad code for which to retrieve data (eg. 2555_2725).

parameters.name: species
parameters.description: The species code (key_value) for which to retrieve data (eg. 269 (Avocet, Pied), 212 (Coot, Red-knobbed), 149 (Eagle, African Fish)). You can put multiple codes, separated by a comma (eg. 269,212,149).

get.summary: ('/' need to be removed) Get the estimated occurrence of a species in a pentad (estimate 'est', median 'med', upper bound 'up', lower bound 'lb')
get.description: See also v1/list_species for all species codes, and the map viewer for a pentad code

parameters.name: pentad
parameters.description: The pentad code for which to retrieve data (eg. 2555_2725).
